name: Ghosts'n Goblins
description: Experience things that go bump in the KNIGHT! Command the heroic Sir Arthur, as you begin a quest to defeat the forces of evil and save your kidnapped girlfriend Guinevere. Scores of evil enemies await you, from zombies to gargoyles, on your journey to save her. Will you survive the perils that lie in wait in that haunted countryside of Ghosts 'n Goblins?
